model:
<goal name="<scheduler>::"schedule meeting">
<goal name="<scheduler>::"find participants">
<goal name="<scheduler>::"gather topics"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<initiator>::"provide topics" />
<goal name="<scheduler>::"gather interests"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<participant>::"provide interests" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<initiator>::"choose participants" />
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<participant>::"choose meeting" />
<goal name="<scheduler>::"collect timetables">
<goal name="<scheduler>::"send request" /> <goal name="<scheduler>::"receive response" />
<goal name="<scheduler>::"choose schedule">
<rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<initiator>::"provide constraints" /> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<participant>::"provide constraints" />
<goal name="<initiator>::"organize meeting">
<goal name="<initiator>::"provide meeting info.">
<goal name="<initiator>::"provide time and location" /> <goal name="<initiator>::"call for participation">
<goal name="<initiator>::"provide topics">
<goal name="<initiator>::"choose participants">
<goal name="<initiator>::"find schedule"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<scheduler>::"schedule meeting" />
<goal name="<participant>::"attend meeting">
<goal name="<participant>::"provide constraints">
<goal name="<participant>::"provide available time and location" /> <goal name="<participant>::"find meeting">
<goal name="<participant>::"provide interests">
<goal name="<participant>::"choose meeting">
<goal name="<participant>::"book schedule"> <rule op="DEPENDENCY" to="<scheduler>::"schedule meeting" />
